Name: My RC Buggy! VR
About the game: My RC Buggy! VR is a RC car themed room-scaled VR game with an emphasis on part collection features: 'physically' picking up parts and putting your RC car together create and customize your RC car with different combinations of bodies, wheels, motors and batteries race in various tracks and unlock more parts (beta feature) 1 on 1 racing against another player good choice for people who hate motion sickness in VR
Meta Title: My RC Buggy! VR: Jun 15, 2018, Chun Y. and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on My RC Buggy! VR? Check out the release date (Jun 15, 2018), developer insights from Chun Y., and a complete game summary.
